text: Tseng Chang (18 May 1930 â€“ 25 January 2021) was a Chinese-American actor. He was known for his roles in Xiang xi shi Wang, Yu ya gon wu and 2012. Tseng was born in Beijing. His career lasted from 1953 to 1995. Tseng died at a hospital in Richmond, British Columbia, Canada on 25 January 2021, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese television actors Category:Actors from Beijing
title: Tseng Chang
